Facebook-f Twitter Instagram

&

Shizuka Minamoto

Putri Pertama dari Bapak Yoshio Minamoto & Ibu Michiko Minamoto

We are getting married

20 August 2022

“And of His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquillity in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.”

( QS. Ar- Rum 21 )

Our Moments
View gallery

Celebrate Our Love

30 August 2020

Akad Nikah

  • 20 Desember 2022
  • Sesi 1 09:00 - 15:00 // Sesi 2 15:00-17:00
  • The Shallimar Boutique Hotel, Kota Malang
  • Jl. Cempaka 2882, Kota Malang, Jawa Timur

  • 20 Desember 2022

Prokes

20 August 2020

Tamu undangan wajib
menggunakan masker.

Jaga jarak antar orang sekitar
minimal sekitar 1 meter.

Suhu tubuh normal
(dibawah 37,5°C)

Cuci tangan menggunakan air dan sabun atau menggunakan hand sanitizer.

Bagi para tamu undangan diharapkan mengikuti protokol pencegahan COVID-19.

Wedding Location

You Are Invited

We can’t wait to celebrate our special day with you.
Nobita & Shizuka
Kpd Bpk/Ibu/Saudara/i
*Mohon Maaf Jika Ada Kesalahan Ejaan Nama & Gelar
